name: Generic Space Shooter (itch) (Cubzer)
description:
This is a very basic twinstick-shooter build in Unity.

Control your Spaceship with WASD or the arrow keys.

Shoot the enemies using the left mousebutton or space. You can keep pressing to fire at max firerate.

To upgrade your firerate press 1 if you have enough money.

This game was a 48h Challenge for myself to get comfortable with 2D Games in Unity.

I would appreciate feedback and bug reports if you have the time.

And thanks for playing my little game btw. You are awesome.
